entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Carignan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:49 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow this morning. Local blowing snow this afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill near minus 20. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 10.
